SIDEBAR (LEFT SIDE)

######################################################################

Column {.sidebar}
Filters

```{r}
# Load airplane dataset

airplane_df = read_csv("datasets/airplane_crashes_data.csv") |>
clean_names() |>
filter(ground != "NULL", aboard != "NULL") |>
select(-flight_number, -time, -registration)

# Parse and clean dates

airplane_df <- airplane_df |>
mutate(
date       = mdy(str_trim(date)),
year       = year(date),
fatalities = as.numeric(fatalities),
operator   = as.factor(operator)
)

# Geocoded cache

geocoded_locations <- read_csv("datasets/geocoded_cache.csv")

df_map <- airplane_df |>
left_join(geocoded_locations, by = c("location" = "location_clean")) |>
filter(!is.na(Latitude), !is.na(Longitude))

# Pre-computed ranges

year_min  <- min(df_map$year, na.rm = TRUE)
year_max  <- max(df_map$year, na.rm = TRUE)
fatal_max <- max(df_map$fatalities, na.rm = TRUE)

# Sidebar inputs

selectizeInput(
"operator_choice", "Choose Operator:",
choices = sort(unique(df_map$operator)),
selected = "Aerocord"
)

numericInput(
"min_fatalities", "Minimum Fatalities:",
value = 50, min = 0, max = fatal_max
)

sliderInput(
"year_choice", "Select Year:",
min = year_min, max = year_max,
value = year_min, step = 1, sep = ""
)

```

ğŸŒ Global Crash Map

```{r}
renderLeaflet({
leaflet(df_map) |>
addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) |>
addCircleMarkers(
lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude,
radius = 5, color = "red", fillOpacity = 0.5,
popup = ~paste0("<b>Operator:</b> ", operator,
"<br><b>Location:</b> ", location,
"<br><b>Date:</b> ", date)
)
})

```

```{r}

addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) |>
addCircleMarkers(

"<br><b>Location:</b> ", location,
"<br><b>Date:</b> ", date)
)
})

```

ğŸ”¥ Crashes by Minimum Fatalities

```{r}
renderLeaflet({
req(input$min_fatalities)

filtered <- df_map |> filter(fatalities >= input$min_fatalities)

leaflet(filtered) |>
addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) |>
addMarkers(
lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude,
clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(),
popup = ~paste0("<b>Operator:</b> ", operator,
"<br><b>Location:</b> ", location,
"<br><b>Date:</b> ", date,
"<br><b>Fatalities:</b> ", fatalities)
)
})

```
